channel.title: Logging - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: System Logging - log data usually kept in /var - service called syslog sends info to system logger syslog components syslogd - daemon - new distros use rsyslogd - waits for event messages and filters them - send to file, console, or do nothing with it. /var/log/syslog - view logs syslog - manages and sends logs to system logger - rsyslog (new version) - output found at /var/log/syslog - except auth messages
